_description: ‘Knowe thy self & thy god’ — nine eight-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
Thenke hertely in þy þouȝtOf what matere þou
                    dede begynne…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…No fleschly lustes þe vndercrepeFle all foly and folwe
                    þe wise
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 101-3.
